Package me.timothy.bots.summon

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BadLoanSummon
    So many people use $loan /u/asdf $100 format that I feel like a little message telling them why it doesn't work is in order.
    CheckSummon
    A summon for checking all loans made by a user
    ConfirmSummon
    A summon for confirming that some money was transfered to someone
    LoanSummon
    For creating a loan where the user the loan is being made out to can be easily and consistently guessed, such as in comments.
    PaidSummon
    Saying that a user has paid back in part or in full a loan
    RecentPostSummon
    Reports posts by users if they post more than once every 24 hours.
    SuicideSummon
    Called when the word suicide is in a comment or submission
    UnpaidSummon
    For when someone does not pay back ones loan in an adequate amount of time
